tool.help:
**What it does** Use BIOM and metadata file as input to perform a differential analysis using R package, DESeq2_ and Phyloseq_.
.. _DESeq2: https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/DESeq2.html .. _Phyloseq: https://joey711.github.io/phyloseq/index.html
-----
**Input**
- **BIOM file** - select BIOM file - **Metadata file** - metadata file contains experimental information. - **factor for differential analysis testing** - select a factor for differential analysis testing - **Select a test statistic** - e.g. Wald or LRT - **Select a fit Type for dispersions** - e.g. parametric or local - **cutoff value for differential analysis** - e.g. 0.05
